## **Isaac Oluwaseyi Ajao (Ph.D)**

# Welcome to my website!

I am a Statistician, Data Analyst, Trainer, and Consultant specializing in Python, R, Stata, and more. With a passion for turning data into actionable insights, I provide expert consulting and training services tailored to individuals, businesses, and organizations. Whether you're looking to master data analysis tools or need professional guidance on your data.

As a Senior Consultant, I have honed my expertise in R Markdown, SmartPLS, and NVivo, equipping organizations with the tools to decipher intricate data landscapes. My approach is rooted in a mission to empower through knowledge, ensuring that every statistical strategy is tailored to promote growth and innovation.

**Statistical Analysis & Training:**

-   Conducted over 50 data analysis workshops for organizations across sectors
-   Consulted on 25+ projects, helping clients gain competitive insights through data-driven strategies
-   Trained 300+ professionals in advanced statistical methodologies
-   Currently training 2000 students virtually on R programming

**Software Development:**

-   Developed 5 user-friendly statistical software solutions, streamlining analysis for 100+ users
-   Improved client productivity by 30% with efficient data visualization and reporting tools

**Academic Editing:**

-   Reviewed and edited 200+ scholarly articles, ensuring adherence to standards
-   Assisted 75+ researchers in refining their work for publication in esteemed journals

**Multimedia Production:**

-   Created compelling visual content for 30+ clients through professional photography/videography
-   Produced 20+ multimedia marketing campaigns, boosting client brand visibility

**Online Education:**

-   Facilitated 15+ online courses, providing accessible training to 500+ learners globally
-   Developed interactive e-learning modules with 90% participant satisfaction rate

On this website, you will find a selection of my published works, including scholarly articles, monographs, and translations. You will also find news and updates on my current research projects, as well as information on upcoming events and conferences where I will be speaking. Please feel free to [contact me](mailto:mail.isaacoluwaseyiajao@gmail.com) if you have any questions or would like to discuss potential projects.
